trans-unit.source: Here you can define the upload directory. This directory can be overwritten in the subpages and is used in the articles and content elements.
If active, you can extend the upload directory.
Here the additional upload directory parts are determined. For example, you can use insert tags to dynamically extend the path.
If this setting is active, existing files are not overwritten. If the file with the same name exists, the file name is extended with the postfix and the counter.
Here you can specify the postfix for the file name. This is appended to the file name if the file name exists.
This sets the initial counter length for the existing file name, which is appended to the file name.
